message.content:
1. A test was conducted on the effects of OSS on workload and 12 facility performance indicators.
2. The test was also conducted on emergency triage assessment and treatment.
3. The test was conducted on HIV testing.
4. The test was conducted on malaria case management among outpatients.
5. The test was conducted on pneumonia case management among outpatients.
6. The test was conducted by two subgroups.
7. One subgroup consisted of mid-level practitioners who attended IMID training (IMID-MLP).
8. The other subgroup consisted of health workers who did not attend IMID training (No-IMID).

messages.content:
Statement: We tested the effects of OSS on workload and 12 facility performance indicators for emergency triage assessment and treatment, HIV testing, and malaria and pneumonia case management among outpatients by two subgroups: 1) mid-level practitioners (MLP) who attended IMID training (IMID-MLP) and 2) health workers who did not (No-IMID).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
